title: Gianluca95
author: Gianluca95
content: Hi there guys,I'm looking for a rust developer because I need to develop a script written in rust. This script will calculate some intervals, and will execute some permutation.If you can help me, please send me a PM or write below.Payment: TBA, but I'm oriented to spend 250$.Thanks.

comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: I am also a Java programmer with half a year of experience Â  I know Rust as a new kind of programming language, fast and easy to use. I'm not sure if there are Rust developers here, but if you need to write simple scripts I can try, I think it's not too difficult to write about computations. In general, programming in new languages will be similar, and I think I can do it, never mind the price.Let's wait and see if anyone else knows rust

comments.author: Joel_Jantsen
comments.body: Hey, Send me a PM! I'm not super proficient in Rust but I can give it a try depending on how difficult your use case is.
